name: Parity (itch) (sh_ggy)
description:
Made for the GMTK2021 Game Jam

Your boss accidentally teleports another planet from a parallel timeline too close to Earth, throwing off the stability of both planets; it’s your responsibility to be able to send the planet back by returning the items falling from the sky. You’re given access to wormhole technology in order to retain the integrity of the other planet by combining these items falling from the sky into key artefacts and sending it back. You only have a few inventory slots to manage the queue of item combinations that the planet requires in order to be stable.

Controls:

You control this wormhole technology with your mouse cursor with items crafting automatically.  You take damage when you either you collect items on a full inventory or you don't fulfill the combination in time.

Credits
